Articles.Content:
So here's an interesting one (1.4.3 with Making History 1.2.0 )

I click delete on the continue saved game menu and the mission builder pops up (the delete game dialog box also comes up behind it).

Cannot confirm, works fine for me.

Which OS and screen resolution do you use?
Pretty strange. I thought it might by a 'click trough' problem since the delete button is close to the mission builder button but even with the same settings, I cannot reproduce bug.
I will see if I can reproduce it
